parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the email contact to get.

nested_items.name: emailContact
nested_items.description: The email contact for the provided email address.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the email contact.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the email contact.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The email address this email contact points to. The activation email and any subscribed emails are sent here.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the email contact. Only activated email contacts receive emails.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The creation time of the resource.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the resource was last updated.
